meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with colorful wildings.
meanings.sent2: The meadow was covered in beautiful wildings.
meanings.sent3: The wildings in the garden seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The wildings crept up the hillside like a green wave.
meanings.sent5: The wildings swayed gently in the wind, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: Wildings: wild or uncultivated young animals
meanings.sent1: The zoo welcomed a new litter of wildings.
meanings.sent2: The farm was home to many playful wildings.
meanings.sent3: The wildings in the petting zoo were quite mischievous.
meanings.sent4: The wildings frolicked in the meadow like joyful sprites.
meanings.sent5: The wildings followed their mother through the forest, learning the ways of the wild.

meanings.definition: Wildings: wild or unruly behavior or actions
meanings.sent1: The classroom was chaotic with wildings during recess.
meanings.sent2: The party turned rowdy with wildings running amok.
meanings.sent3: The wildings at the park were full of energy and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The wildings of the city streets seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent5: The wildings of the group caused quite a commotion wherever they went.
